summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 165G Jumbo Braiding Hair Blonde Synthetic Jumbo Braids 3 Packs
Review Date: 2020/07/24
Store: UHair
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '13.94 x 6.69 x 3.74 inches; 1.19 Pounds'}
Review Text: I wanted to make my own Rapunzel wig but cwas dissatisfied with the cost from Arda you only get 1 for $10 plus shipping and I needed 3 of them. I got these 3 for half the cost I originally bought from Arda. I kept the Arda ones until these came in just to check quality and they’re literally the exact same thing. So I sent the Arda ones back. I think the wig came out beautifully and you can’t even tell this was 3 separate braids at one point. Definitely would buy again! I followed a tutorial I found on google to make the wig, then added my own touches by including the lights!
Review Title: Perfect base for Rapunzel Braids!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Cute Cartoon Makeup Brushes Set - 8pcs Fairy Makeup Brushes with Soft Pink Fiber and Metallic Handle for Eyebrow, Eyeshadow, Foundation, Blending and Lips, Great Gift for Sister Girlfriend (Style B)
Review Date: 2020/08/25
Store: rongji jewelry
Average Rating: 4.6
Product Details: {'Brand': 'rongji jewelry', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Face Makeup', 'Color': 'Pink', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Wand', 'Number of Pieces': '8', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult,Teen', 'Ferrule Material': 'Aluminum', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '8.2 x 3.8 x 1.3 inches; 5.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '745695122377'}
Review Text: VERY sturdy brushes. I was completely thrown at how sturdy/heavy these brushes are. I was totally expecting cheap light plastic handles that would break easily but that isn’t the case at all. The bristle portion of them is nice to because they’re not to thick or thin, easy to clean, and don’t shed off. Super cute Designs, I know who bts is but I’m not like a super fan or own any of their music to be honest but they definitely have quality merch as proven by these brushes. I don’t really care for the bag they came in, it’s nice enough but feels cheap in comparison to the brushes themselves. I just have them in my makeup bag instead.
Review Title: Very good quality
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Forfeels Long Straight Black Wig Synthetic Wigs for Women Natural Middle Part Lace Wig Heat Resistant Fiber Natural Looking Wig (30inch, Black Color)
Review Date: 2020/08/25
Store: forfeels
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Forfeels', 'Package Dimensions': '9.33 x 6.34 x 2.36 inches; 10.58 Ounces', 'UPC': '791262892525'}
Review Text: Not a lace front wig. I wouldn’t even consider it a partial lace front. The only place it had lace was right at the part. It’s not a horrible or even bad wig. But it’s not a lace front. The fibers were soft but did shed. It’s comfortable enough to wear, but a little tight if you already have a lot of hair going under it. Can’t recommend it to any cosplayers out there looking at this for a costume, I think styling it may be hard with the way it’s wefted and fact it’s not actually a lace front if that’s what you’re looking for.
Review Title: Not actually a lace front wig
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Cortex International Black Series Duo Platinum 1.25-Inch & 0.5 Inch Travel Size Gemstone Infused Ceramic Plates Duet Flat Iron (Rose Wood)
Review Date: 2020/09/09
Store: Cortex
Average Rating: 3.6
Product Details: {'Shape': 'Round', 'Brand': 'Cortex', 'Hair Type': 'Dry, Curly, Straight', 'Material': 'Wood,Ceramic', 'Power Source': 'Corded Electric', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '13.19 x 4.13 x 3.98 inches; 2.2 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'CTX-DUO-125RW', 'UPC': '819804020950', 'Manufacturer': 'International'}
Review Text: The color is great, the actual product not so much and not worth the price. You could easily buy a better one at big lots for less then half the cost. The full size definitely did not get as hot as it should have and didn’t retain the heat. It wouldn’t straighten my hair. The mini got to temp but would take you forever to do your whole head. It was not as wide as described, the mini is more like a bangs straightener then a mini straightener which is fine for baby hairs and of course bangs. Over all a disappointment given I like the color so much. I’ll be tossing the full size but keeping the mini.
Review Title: Doesn’t get to or hold temp
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Leuxe Facial Cleansing Brush, IPX6 Waterproof Rotating Face Brush for Deep Cleansing, 3 Modes and Smart Timer
Review Date: 2020/09/09
Store: leuxe
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'leuxe', 'Power Source': 'electric', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Pores,Cleansing', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Operation Mode': 'Automatic', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 4 x 2.7 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'UPC': '631517347748', 'Manufacturer': 'leuxe'}
Review Text: Super easy to hold and use, came in great packaging, and works really well! My only complaint would be that it adds yet another recharging product to my life and I wish it came with a docking system so I could always be charging it rather then a cube/cord combo I have to remember to plug in. I don’t use it every day, every other but it works well with my daily routine when I do.
Review Title: It works!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 24 Inches Synthetic Long Curly Blonde Wig Natural Wavy Hair NONE Lace Heat Resistant Wigs for Women Cosplay Costume
Review Date: 2020/09/25
Store: AILIWEI
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '6.69 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'AILIWEI', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '6.69 x 3.94 x 1.97 inches; 9.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '710731915817'}
Review Text: Nice color and length, with some styling I think this could look very natural. It sheds a bit so I recommend a good brushing with a wig brush. Overall a very good quality wig for the price. Standard wig cap so on larger heads may feel tight.
Review Title: Nice and natural
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Juziviee Brown Wigs for Women, 13'' Short Brown Bob Wig with Bangs, Natural Looking Soft Synthetic Hair Wig, Cute Wigs for Party Cosplay Halloween AD016BR1
Review Date: 2020/12/31
Store: Juziviee
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Straight', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'Juziviee', 'Package Dimensions': '11.02 x 7.48 x 1.73 inches; 6.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '824381921644'}
Review Text: A nice affordable option for cosplayers that need a very blunt style wig and don’t want to style something themselves. To me some spots on the back could be a little more wefted/thicker but it never shows the wig cap so it’s not too thin. Wig cap is a good fit/size with good stretch making it comfortable to wear
Review Title: A good fit
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: SHINYSHOW 14'' Women's Party Wig Short Wavy Wig with Bangs Synthetic Cosplay Wig Average Size (Fresh Blue)
Review Date: 2021/01/05
Store: SHINYSHOW
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'SHINYSHOW', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '10.98 x 8.46 x 2.09 inches; 8.47 Ounces'}
Review Text: Cute but a little on the thin side, I wish it had been just a bit longer in length. For the price it’s not a bad budget friendly cosplay option. I used it for a casual catbug cosplay for a zoom event. The wig cap in my opinion felt a bit small and gave me a headache after 2 hours. It’s not super thick but wasn’t so thin you saw the cap either.
Review Title: Cute
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Altaba Long Wavy Wigs Ombre gray Wig Synthetic Wigs Middle Part Natural Looking Heat Resistant Party Cosplay Full Wig for Women
Review Date: 2021/01/05
Store: Altaba
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Altaba', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'UPC': '788436507620'}
Review Text: This ombré style is more like bad roots for days in need of a dye job immediately. I feel like mine was almost all dark with the ends being light. I can’t recommend it because you don’t really get what’s pictured. It’s ok otherwise, almost on the verge of being a Halloween level wig. It’s not as thick as you’d like it to be but not thin enough you’re seeing the wig cap. The wig cap is the standard size so it’s not to small or tight but mine sat weird and tried to bubble a bit on my head. It had to be left on a wig head inside out for days to correct it. I feel like you could easily find this in another brand but better.
Review Title: Kind of cheap looking
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 28 inch Long Blonde 613 Wig Long Body Wavy Synthetic Wig Natural Looking Hair Replacement Wigs Blonde 613 Glueless Heat Resistant Fiber Wig
Review Date: 2021/03/13
Store: ALIABSION
Average Rating: 3.3
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'ALIABSION', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item model number': 'SW-Wigs-613#', 'UPC': '779303844085'}
Review Text: Other then it not having bangs I thought this wig was rather nice. Perfect for Victorian era vampire costumes for sure with the cut and wave along with the color. Overall I’m very pleased with it. It’s got good thickness and the wig cap was comfortable to wear.
Review Title: Victorian Vampires
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: JGMI Wig 613 Lace Front Wig Human Hair 13x4 Blonde Wig Straight Wave Brazilian Virgin Human Hair Pre Plucked with Baby Hair 150 Density 18 Inch
Review Date: 2021/05/12
Store: JGMI
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'JGMI', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult'}
Review Text: Definitely not as long as it’s pictured to be. I would say at most it’s shoulder length. I’m also not sure if it’s actually human hair? It looks more natural then my other wigs but it doesn’t feel much different than synthetic. Way over priced for what you’re getting if it’s not real human hair and the style it is is not great. I’m honestly not even sure where to begin working this into a natural looking style because it seems it can only be worn as is. The color is very nice though.
Review Title: Not sure about this one
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Got2b Glued Spray Wax with 2-in-1 Dual Nozzle, 8 oz
Review Date: 2021/05/25
Store: Got2B
Product Description: ['The first dual-finish spray wax has officially hit the shelves! The got2b glued Spray Wax provides two looks with one product. So whether you want flexible texture or structured hold, this product has you covered! Best of all, this lightweight formula doesn’t leave your hair feeling sticky or crunchy. Create your own look and style. Turn to position 1 for flexible texture, turn to position 2 for structured hold. Be whoever you want 2b with got2b glued Spray Wax!']
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Firm Hold', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Liquid Volume': '8 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 8.38 inches; 9.87 Ounces', 'Item model number': '31307', 'UPC': '017000313078', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/DIAW7', 'Country of Origin': 'USA'}
Review Text: Great for styling your hair even better if you’re a cosplayer trying to style a spikey or unusual style wig. I use it to help set my curly wigs and keep them from becoming a hot mess. It’s very easy to use as it’s just a spray but you should set it with a hair dryer for best results. The scent is eh.
Review Title: Great for cosplay
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vroosar Pink Wigs for Women Short Wavy Bob Wig Synthetic Curly Wigs Pastel Bob Synthetic Cosplay Wig for Girl Colorful Costume Wigs
Review Date: 2021/08/18
Store: vroosar
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly,Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Heat Resistant', 'Brand': 'vroosar', 'Package Dimensions': '12.76 x 8.46 x 2.28 inches; 5.93 Ounces', 'UPC': '738598811677'}
Review Text: The style is a bit shorter then I would have thought from the photos and description. It’s not a bad wig but I don’t think it’s good either. The fiber texture was kind of waxy and I found the wig cap a bit tight.
Review Title: It’s ok
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: S SNUOY Purple Crystal Vintage Queen Crowns Baroque Tiaras Wedding Bridal Queen Tiaras and Crowns for Women and Girls Party Headbands
Review Date: 2021/08/21
Store: S SNUOY
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.17 x 4.88 x 4.33 inches; 4.66 Ounces'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:dfc5eab74dc0df3d48cce0a4bd02263a]] A lot of the crowns I own come packaged in a box with some form of padding either paper or foam. This one was only wrapped in a plastic bag and it shows because the product arrived bent way out of shape and could easily been broken due to its poor packaging. I was able to bend it back but it seems like those spots are particularly weak now and could easily be snapped off. I would recommend buying things like this from other parties who package the product correctly, otherwise you may end up with something as pictured or worse. The color was pretty and it had good sparkle but for the cost for it to arrive damaged I’ve gotten similar in nice boxes for the same price.
Review Title: Arrived bent
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Uniquebe Long Straight Rose Red Wigs for Women Middle Part Natural Looking Silk Fully Heat Resistant Synthetic Wig for Daily Party Anime Fashion Women's Cosplay Wig + 1 Free Wig Cap (Rose Red)
Review Date: 2021/09/28
Store: Half and Half
Average Rating: 4.5
Product Details: {'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Brand': 'Half and Half', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 4 x 2 inches; 4.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '701705851064'}
Review Text: Wig was nice and long while remaining fuller then some wigs can be. It did tangle easily because of the length so you may want to condition it to help prevent knots. The wig cap was comfortable for long wear and wasn’t to small or to big for an adult head. The color was very vibrant. A good budget option for cosplayers.
Review Title: Nice budget wig
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step:

    1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments
    2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases
    3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns
    4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences

    Remember to:
    - Focus only on keywords and  trends supported by multiple interactions
    - Avoid repeating specific product names or details

Review Text: [[VIDEOID:dfc5eab74dc0df3d48cce0a4bd02263a]] A lot of the crowns I own come packaged in a box with some form of padding either paper or foam. This one was only wrapped in a plastic bag and it shows because the product arrived bent way out of shape and could easily been broken due to its poor packaging. I would recommend buying things like this from other parties who package the product correctly, otherwise you may end up with something as pictured or worse. SUMMARY:  
The individual displays a clear preference for affordable, quality wigs and hair accessories, reflecting a strong interest in cosplay and creative self-expression. They consistently rate products highly when the quality meets or exceeds expectations, often justifying their purchases based on cost-effectiveness compared to more expensive alternatives. Sentiments reveal dissatisfaction with overhyped items failing to deliver on quality or functionality, indicating an aversion to overpriced products. 

Patterns in product purpose show a strong focus on wigs suitable for cosplay and casual events, favoring options that are heat resistant, comfortable, and aesthetically pleasing. They prefer products that offer good styling versatility and often comment on color vibrancy and natural appearance, indicating a keen eye for detail. The individual demonstrates moderate price sensitivity, favoring budget-friendly options while still valuing durability and quality.

Quality preferences highlight the importance of sturdy materials, as seen in their positive remarks about well-constructed beauty tools, like makeup brushes. They exhibit a willingness to experiment with synthetic products but seek assurance of quality, leading to varied ratings based on product performance. 

In summary, this person's core preferences center around cost-effective, versatile, and high-quality wigs and beauty products, with a particular lens on usability for cosplay and daily styling.

target_interaction.title: Super cute
target_interaction.text: Though not quite as thick and luscious as the product photos the wig is true in color and curly style. It’s super cute and comfortable to wear. I was able to easily straighten it for the character I needed it for and once I was done with it my friend was able to recurl it for an every day use wig. We both really love it.
